## ChatToggle (component)

The ChatToggle component toggles the visibility of the chat component.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function ChatToggle(props: ChatToggleProps): React.JSX.Element;
```

## Usage

```tsx
<LiveKitRoom>
  <ToggleChat />
</LiveKitRoom>
```
